attributes.action: Re-instate replays in the FA Cup, for the benefit of all football clubs
attributes.additional_details:
With grassroots clubs having a difficult time as it is, and teams folding. This is a bad choice!

The knock on affect in communities in these areas is undeniable, from local newsagents, public houses, restaurants, transport links (bus/taxi etc..)

There is also the spirit & magic, that for over 150yrs has been alive in the FA Cup, people plan lives around their clubs

A good FA Cup draw is the dream of every club, taking away replays, will dampen the experience for many clubs outside the top 20
attributes.background: To re-instate FA Cup replays, the benefit this can have on clubs outside of the The Premier League is huge financially, both for the clubs and communities.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about arrangements for football matches and tournaments are a matter for the football authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
